tag.description: Eureka-BPO PremiumSchedule - Schedule Component with premium FullCalendar features: Vertical Resource View and Timeline View

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: An eu.eurekabpo.primefaces.model.PremiumScheduleModel instance representing the backed model.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: User locale for i18n localization messages. The attribute can be either a String or java.util.Locale object.
attribute.name: locale

attribute.description: Defines direction of schedule. Valid values are "ltr" (default) and "rtl".
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: Ratio of calendar width to height, higher the value shorter the height is.
attribute.name: aspectRatio

attribute.description: The view type to use, possible values are 'dayGridMonth', 'dayGridWeek', 'dayGridDay', 'timeGridWeek', 'timeGridDay', 'listYear' , 'listMonth', 'listWeek', 'listDay'. Default is 'dayGridMonth'.
attribute.name: view

attribute.description: The initial date that is used when schedule loads. If ommitted, the schedule starts on the current date.
attribute.name: initialDate

attribute.description: Specifies inclusion Saturday/Sunday columns in any of the views. Default is true.
attribute.name: showWeekends

attribute.description: Style of the main container element of schedule.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the main container element of schedule.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: When true, events are draggable. Default is true.
attribute.name: draggable

attribute.description: When true, events are resizable. Default is true.
attribute.name: resizable
selectable
attribute.description: Enables selection of time ranges by clicking and dragging on the schedule, see https://fullcalendar.io/docs/select-callback. Uses the ajax-event "rangeSelect" instead of "dateSelect".
Specifies visibility of header content. Default is true.
attribute.name: showHeader

attribute.description: Content of left side of header. Default is "prev, next today"
attribute.name: leftHeaderTemplate

attribute.description: Content of center of header. Default is title.
attribute.name: centerHeaderTemplate

attribute.description: Content of right side of header. Default is "dayGridMonth,timeGridWeek,timeGridDay"
attribute.name: rightHeaderTemplate

attribute.description: Determines if all-day slot will be displayed in agendaWeek or agendaDay views. Default is true.
attribute.name: allDaySlot

attribute.description: The frequency for displaying time slots. Default is 00:30:00.
attribute.name: slotDuration

attribute.description: Determines how far down the scroll pane is initially scrolled down. Default is 06:00:00.
attribute.name: scrollTime

attribute.description: Minimum time to display in a day view. Default is 00:00:00.
attribute.name: minTime

attribute.description: Maximum time to display in a day view. Default is 24:00:00.
attribute.name: maxTime

attribute.description: TThe frequency that the time slots should be labelled with text. Example: like "01:00" or "{hours:1}".
attribute.name: slotLabelInterval

attribute.description: Determines the time-text that will be displayed on each event. (Moment.js - format)
attribute.name: timeFormat

attribute.description: Deprecated, use columnHeaderFormat instead. Format for column headers.
attribute.name: columnFormat

attribute.description: Format for column headers. (eg `timeGridWeek: {weekday: 'narrow'}` or `timeGridWeek: {weekday: 'short'}, timeGridDay: {day: 'numeric'}`)
attribute.name: columnHeaderFormat

attribute.description: String or a java.util.TimeZone instance to specify the timezone used for date conversion to ISO_8601 format, defaults to ZoneId.systemDefault().
attribute.name: timeZone

attribute.description: Timezone to define how to interpret the dates at browser. Valid values are "local", "UTC" and ids like "America/Chicago", defaults to "local".
attribute.name: clientTimeZone

attribute.description: Displays description of events on a tooltip, default value is false.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: Display week numbers in schedule.
attribute.name: showWeekNumbers

attribute.description: Name of javascript function to extend the options of the underlying fullcalendar plugin.
attribute.name: extender

attribute.description: Whether or not to display an event's end time text when it is rendered on the calendar. Value can be a boolean to globally configure for all views or a comma separated list such as "month:false,basicWeek:true" to configure per view.
attribute.name: displayEventEnd

attribute.description: The method for calculating week numbers that are displayed. Valid values are "local" (default), "ISO" and "custom".
attribute.name: weekNumberCalculation

attribute.description: Client side function to use in custom weekNumberCalculation.
attribute.name: weekNumberCalculator

attribute.description: When an event's end time spans into another day, the minimum time it must be in order for it to render as if it were on that day. Default is 09:00:00.
attribute.name: nextDayThreshold

attribute.description: If true contemporary events will be rendered one overlapping the other, else they will be rendered side by side.
attribute.name: slotEventOverlap

attribute.description: Determines the text that will be displayed within a time slot.
attribute.name: slotLabelFormat

attribute.description: Target for events with urls. Clicking on such events in the schedule will not trigger the selectEvent but open the url using this target instead. Default is "_blank".
attribute.name: urlTarget

attribute.description: Whether for URL events access to the opener window from the target site should be prevented (phishing protection), default value is true.
attribute.name: noOpener

attribute.description: Sets the height of the entire calendar, including header and footer. By default, this option is unset and the calendar's height is calculated by aspectRatio. If "auto" is specified, the view's contents will assume a natural height and no scrollbars will be used.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Resource view with dates above resources, default value is false.
attribute.name: datesAboveResources

attribute.description: Visually groups resources by certain criteria.
attribute.name: resourceGroupField

attribute.description: Determines the width of the area that contains the list of resources. default: "30%".
attribute.name: resourceAreaWidth

attribute.description: The text that will appear above the list of resources. default: "Resources".
attribute.name: resourceLabelText

attribute.description: Whether child resources should be expanded when the view loads, default value is true.
attribute.name: resourcesInitiallyExpanded

attribute.description: Determines how wide each of the time-axis slots will be. Specified as a number of pixels. When not specified, a reasonable value will be automatically computed.
attribute.name: slotMinWidth

attribute.description: Determines the minimum width an event is allowed to be. Default value is 30.
attribute.name: eventMinWidth

tag.description: Password component is an extended version of standard inputSecret component with theme integration and strength indicator.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Value of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: When set true, process validations logic is executed at apply request values phase for this component. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Marks component as required.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: A method expression referring to a method validating the input.
attribute.name: validator

attribute.description: A method binding expression referring to a method for handling a valuchangeevent.
attribute.name: valueChangeListener

attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when conversion fails.
attribute.name: converterMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when validation fails.
attribute.name: validatorMessage

attribute.description: Access key to transfer focus to the input element.
attribute.name: accesskey

attribute.description: Alternate textual description of the input element.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: Controls browser autocomplete behavior.
attribute.name: autocomplete

attribute.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality.
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: Disables the input element, default is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: A localized user presentable name.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup.
attribute.name: lang

attribute.description: Maximum number of characters that may be entered in this field.
attribute.name: maxlength

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element loses focus.
attribute.name: onblur

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element loses focus and its value has been modified since gaining focus.
attribute.name: onchange

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element is clicked.
attribute.name: onclick

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element is double clicked.
attribute.name: ondblclick

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element receives focus.
attribute.name: onfocus

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed down over input element.
attribute.name: onkeydown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed and released over input element.
attribute.name: onkeypress

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is released over input element.
attribute.name: onkeyup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is pressed down over input element.
attribute.name: onmousedown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved within input element.
attribute.name: onmousemove

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved away from input element.
attribute.name: onmouseout

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved onto input element.
attribute.name: onmouseover

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is released over input element.
attribute.name: onmouseup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when the mouse wheel rolls up or down over an element.
attribute.name: onwheel

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when text within input element is selected by user.
attribute.name: onselect

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when the user copies the content of an element.
attribute.name: oncut

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when the user cuts the content of an element.
attribute.name: oncopy

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when the user pastes some content in an element.
attribute.name: onpaste

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an element gets user input.
attribute.name: oninput

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a context menu is triggered.
attribute.name: oncontextmenu

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an element is invalid.
attribute.name: oninvalid

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when the Reset button in a form is clicked.
attribute.name: onreset

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when the user writes something in a search field.
attribute.name: onsearch

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an element is dragged.
attribute.name: ondrag

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute at the end of a drag operation.
attribute.name: ondragend

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an element has been dragged to a valid drop target.
attribute.name: ondragenter

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an element leaves a valid drop target.
attribute.name: ondragleave

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an element is being dragged over a valid drop target.
attribute.name: ondragover

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute at the start of a drag operation.
attribute.name: ondragstart

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when dragged element is being dropped.
attribute.name: ondrop

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when an element's scrollbar is being scrolled.
attribute.name: onscroll

attribute.description: Flag indicating that this input element will prevent changes by the user.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: Inline style of the component.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the component.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Position of the element in the tabbing order.
attribute.name: tabindex

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip information.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: The placeholder attribute specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an input field.
attribute.name: placeholder

attribute.description: HTML5 inputmode attribute for hinting at the type of data this control has for touch devices to display appropriate virtual keyboard.
attribute.name: inputmode

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Enables strength indicator. Default is false.
attribute.name: feedback

attribute.description: Displays feedback inline rather than using a popup. Default is false.
attribute.name: inline

attribute.description: Label of prompt. Default is "Please enter a password"
attribute.name: promptLabel

attribute.description: Label of weak password. Default is "Weak"
attribute.name: weakLabel

attribute.description: Label of good password. Default is "Good"
attribute.name: goodLabel

attribute.description: Label of strong password. Default is "Strong"
attribute.name: strongLabel

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not a previously entered password should be rendered in form. Default is false.
attribute.name: redisplay

attribute.description: Identifier of another password component to match value against.
attribute.name: match

attribute.description: Event to show the feedback overlay panel, default is "focus".
attribute.name: showEvent

attribute.description: Event to hide the feedback overlay panel, default is "blur".
attribute.name: hideEvent

attribute.description: Disable LastPass autofill for this password field. Default is false.
attribute.name: ignoreLastPass

attribute.description: Adds a show/hide icon to the password to allow the password to be unmasked/remasked. Default is false.
attribute.name: toggleMask

attribute.description: Placeholder for value to show on client side. Default is null.
attribute.name: valuePlaceholder
